title: Gain wiser investing knowledge with 20% off this stock screening tool
content:
Macworld

The more you listen to high-profile players talk about the stock market, the more intimidating it seems. Tykr was created with one purpose in mind: to cut through the numbers and deliver concise information to investors, no matter what their investing experience.

This innovative investment education platform and stock screener has been racking up rave reviews on sites like TrustPilot (4.9 stars!) and AppSumo, and now, new users can find out why with an exclusive coupon (ENJOY20) that reduces the sale price by 20%, now under $96.

Tykr uses complex algorithms to provide analysis and research for more than 30,000 domestic and international stocks. To invest more wisely, you can browse Tykr’s offering of detailed financial statements, stock charts, and more to gain more knowledge. At a glance, you can tell whether stocks are on the move as a potential sale or buy, and users can also take advantage of Tykr’s real-time stock alerts and updates.

Users can even use the platform’s portfolio tracker to view their investments’ performance, as well as connect with fellow investors through Tykr’s community forum.

You can simplify the world of investing with analysis, research, and more from Tykr.

Use code ENJOY20 to grab a lifetime subscription to Tykr Stock Screener for just $95.99 through March 10 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific.

 

Tykr Stock Screener: Premium Plan Lifetime Subscription

Only $95.99 at Macworld

StackSocial prices subject to change.
